item.title: No lights on at all over the bridge, 31st December
item.description:
There has been no lights on this bridge for a while. The other night i fell over due to no lights and have injured my leg. It's very dark and unsafe as people dump rubbish on the bridge too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bronze Age Way, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing yellow street bin, 31st December
item.description:
Overflow yellow street bin with rubbish scattered on the floor. The shopping trolley has been left there for few months and old pillow bag lying on the floor. Is it possible for the bin to be emptied and any rubbished on the floor cleared. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wadeville Close, Lessness Heath, Greater London

item.title: Furniture on pavement outside house for weeks, 31st December
item.description:
Outside no 6 Spencer Gardens a number of mattresses and furniture has been on the pavement outside the house. We understand they are waiting for Greenwich council to pick up. We had to walk on the far side of the pavement to avoid it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Spencer Gardens, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 potholes increasing in size- probably a foot square and several inches deep, 31st December

item.title: The footpath barrier is severely bent, 31st December
item.description:
The footpath barrier is severely bent and making it very difficult for those with pushchairs/prams or for people with mobility issues to negotiate the spaces to give access to or egress from Cranston Road to Vancouver Road along the linking footpath and lane,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cranston Road, Perry Vale, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
